com.redhat.rhn.manager.org

Class MigrationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.BaseManager
      • com.redhat.rhn.manager.org.MigrationManager

  • public class MigrationManager
extends BaseManager
    MigrationManager Handles the migration of systems from one organization to another.

    • Method Detail

      • migrateServers

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Long> migrateServers(User user,
                                            Org toOrg,
                                            java.util.List<Server> servers)
        Migrate a set of servers to the organization specified
        Parameters:
        user - Org admin that is performing the migration
        toOrg - The destination org
        servers - List of servers to be migrated
        Returns:
        the list of server ids successfully migrated.

      • removeOrgRelationships

        public static void removeOrgRelationships(User user,
                          Server server)
        Remove a server's relationships with it's current org. Used to clean the servers associations in the database in preparation for migration before the server profile is moved to the migration queue.
        Parameters:
        user - Org admin performing the migration.
        server - Server to be migrated.

      • updateAdminRelationships

        public static void updateAdminRelationships(Org fromOrg,
                            Org toOrg,
                            Server server)
        Update the org admin to server relationships in the originating and destination orgs.
        Parameters:
        fromOrg - originating org where the server currently exists
        toOrg - destination org where the server will be migrated to
        server - Server to be migrated.

      • moveServerToOrg

        public static void moveServerToOrg(Org toOrg,
                   Server server)
        Move the server to the destination org.
        Parameters:
        toOrg - destination org where the server will be migrated to
        server - Server to be migrated.
